translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Reversal of the Law

analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.41. Sanidassanaduka, Sanidassanattika🔽Nasanidassanaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: sa nidassana duka sa nidassana ttika  na sa nidassanam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa nidassanaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ
translated: The visible, the visible with impact

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nasanidassanaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka  na sa nidassanam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anidassanaḥ anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: A visible, visible with impact, idea is due to a visible, visible with impact, condition by way of root-cause condition. (In brief.) In the root-cause, one; in the predominance, one; … in the unhampered, one.🔽A non-visible, non-visible with impact, idea is due to a non-visible, non-visible with impact, condition by way of root-cause condition. (In brief.) In the root-cause, one; in the predominance, one; … in the unhampered, one.

original: Nasanidassanaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa nidassanam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anidassanaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: A non-visible, non-visible without impact, idea is due to a non-visible, non-visible without impact, condition by way of root-cause condition. (In brief.) In the root-cause, one; in the predominance, one; … in the unhampered, one.
